title: London Comedy Lunch
subtitle: Website Development
body:
London Comedy Lunch is a website that was developed to serve as a landing page for an upcoming event of the same name. The website was designed to provide information about the event and allow visitors to enquire about table reservations. The development of the website involved the use of several technologies, including the Bootstrap CSS framework and HTML programming.
The website was designed to be visually appealing and easy to navigate, with the use of images and other visual elements to give visitors an insight into the event. The branding of the website was also carefully considered, with the client providing specific assets that needed to be incorporated into the design.
The Bootstrap CSS framework was used to create a responsive and mobile-friendly layout, ensuring that the website would look great on any device. The HTML programming was used to create the structure of the website and provide the necessary functionality.
In addition to the development of the website, we also provide hosting and maintenance services to ensure that the website remains up-to-date and runs smoothly. This includes regular updates and backups, as well as troubleshooting and problem resolution.
Overall, the development of London Comedy Lunch website was a success, providing an effective platform for promoting the event and providing visitors with all the information they need to make a reservation.

title: Athol Paints
subtitle: Awesome portfolio
body:
In a typical React application, data is passed top-down (parent to child) via props, but such usage can be cumbersome for certain types of props (e.g. locale preference, UI theme).


that are required by many components within an application. Context provides a way to share values like these between components without having to explicitly pass a prop through every level of the tree.
